{'is_id': '98765'}.response: Thank you for providing your IS ID number 98765. With this information, we have successfully identified your ticket for the upcoming event at events.uel.edu.vn. Your ticket is confirmed, and all related information is now accessible. Please ensure that this ID is kept secure and is presented at the event entrance for verification. Should you have any further questions or require assistance regarding the event details, don't hesitate to reach out to our support team. Enjoy the event!
